name: Only One Look Revised
description:
You only have one look so don't rush into things. Wait and see how the enemies and level behave. Good luck!

Controls: R to restart the game, WASD/arrows to move, SPACE to wait, S to start the level.

Revised version, because previous sadly has a game breaking bug, that I didn't have the time to catch, since the server was down. Sorry about that!
